Directions: Use the information below to answer each question that follows.
Content: Two cities can be across the world from each other, yet have very similar climates.
The climate of a city may be more similar to a city that is farther away than it is to a city that is closer.
The locations of eight cities around the world are shown on the map in Figure 1. The average temperatures and the average annual precipitation of the cities are shown in Table 1.
